item.title: Projects
item.description: I always try to find time to work and learn something new. Usually, most of these pet-projects don’t see the light of day. They are, however, great opportunities to try something in the real world and learn from it.

item.title: Setting up Ubuntu Desktop Environment on Wsl2
item.description: Introduction # If you’ve encountered difficulties while configuring the Ubuntu desktop environment on WSL2, fret not. Here’s a quick guide to help you through the process. Step 1: Update Your Package Manager # Ensure your package manager is up-to-date using the following command:
